meanings.sent1: The budgetary report showed our spending for the month.
meanings.sent2: We need to make budgetary decisions for our upcoming project.
meanings.sent3: The budgetary restrictions made planning the party a challenge.
meanings.sent4: Her budgetary skills were as sharp as a knife when it came to saving money.
meanings.sent5: The budgetary process helped us allocate funds effectively.

meanings.definition: Involving or referring to a budget.
meanings.sent1: The budgetary meeting discussed our financial plans for the year.
meanings.sent2: Budgetary concerns are important for the success of any business.
meanings.sent3: The budgetary discussions turned into a heated debate.
meanings.sent4: Her budgetary expertise shone brightly during the audit.
meanings.sent5: The budgetary analysis revealed areas for improvement.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a budget or budgeting.
meanings.sent1: Budgetary decisions impact our financial stability.
meanings.sent2: The budgetary process requires careful planning.
meanings.sent3: His budgetary skills were put to the test during the economic downturn.
meanings.sent4: The budgetary constraints forced us to prioritize our expenses.
meanings.sent5: Budgetary adjustments were necessary to stay within our means.
